# FileSwift

> Free online file tools for compression, conversion, and editing. Secure, fast, and no signup required.

## About
FileSwift is a privacy-first platform offering free online tools to manage your PDF, Image, and Document files. All processing happens securely, and files are automatically deleted after 1 hour.

## Top Tools

### PDF Tools
- [Compress PDF](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/compress-pdf): Reduce PDF file size efficiently for email or upload limits.
- [PDF to Word](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/pdf-to-word): Convert PDF documents to editable Word (DOCX) files.
- [Merge PDF](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/merge-pdf): Combine multiple PDF files into one.
- [PDF to Image](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/pdf-to-image): Extract pages from PDF as JPG or PNG images.

### Image Tools
- [Image Resizer](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/image-resizer): Resize images by pixel dimensions or percentage.
- [Image Compressor](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/image-compressor): Reduce image size (JPG, PNG, WEBP) without quality loss.
- [Image to PDF](https://www.fileswift.in/tools/image-to-pdf): Convert photos to a single PDF document.

## Solutions
- [Use Cases](https://www.fileswift.in/use-cases): Specialized guides for Students, Professionals, and Creators.

## Why Use FileSwift?
- **Free**: No hidden costs or limits.
- **Secure**: 256-bit SSL encryption and auto-deletion policy.
- **Fast**: Optimized algorithms for quick processing in the browser.
- **No Signup**: Use all tools instantly without creating an account.

## Technical Details
- **URL**: https://www.fileswift.in
- **Sitemap**: https://www.fileswift.in/sitemap.xml
